articles.title: Toyota and HERO shift gears in new campaign for GR Yaris launch
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Toyota Australia has launched the new GR Yaris, including an auto variant, supported by a marketing campaign. The GR Yaris is positioned for both rally stages and weekday commutes. The multi-channel rollout includes TV, digital, and social media, featuring a hero spot with stunts and behind-the-scenes content.

articles.title: BMW IX3 Can Challenge Every Market, Even China, Says Chairman Zipse
articles.author: James Morris
articles.summary: BMW is launching the iX3, the first SUV (SAV) in the Neue Klasse line, ahead of the IAA Mobility 2025 show. The iX3 50 model features a 108.7kWh battery with 500 WLTP miles of range and a dual-motor system delivering 469hp, along with a new Panoramic iDrive user interface. An i3 sedan version is also coming soon, with 40 new and updated models expected by 2027.

articles.title: Nissan Z Nismo to gain manual option
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: The Z was launched in 2022 featuring a retro-inspired body and redesigned interior. The vehicle's platform is an updated version of the one used in the 370Z, which originally went into production in 2008.

articles.title: Snapchat Launches First Open Prompt AI Lens
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Snapchat has launched a new generative AI feature called 'Imagine Lens'.  This feature allows users to recreate images from the Snap camera or camera roll using text prompts. The 'Imagine Lens' is available to Lens+ and Snapchat+ Platinum subscribers.

articles.title: Google's Nest Hub Max now makes Zoom video calls
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Google is rolling out Zoom video call support to its Nest Hub Max devices. This update is available through a preview and aims to support socially distant holiday gatherings.

articles.title: Food giants tap startups to unlock Africa's vast informal market
articles.author: Moneyweb
articles.summary: OmniRetail and TradeDepot are new businesses targeting the Nigerian market. They aim to connect consumer-goods makers with an estimated 8 million informal traders. This suggests the introduction of new services or platforms within the Nigerian consumer goods market.

articles.title: Zoox unveils a self-driving car that could become Amazon's first robotaxi
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Zoox has unveiled a self-driving car. This car could potentially become Amazon's first robotaxi.

articles.title: Zoom calls are beginning to arrive on the Google Nest Hub Max
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Zoom calls are now available on the Google Nest Hub Max. This integration introduces a new service option for users of the Google Nest Hub Max.

articles.title: Dell's Newest Flagship Aurora Line Redefines High-End Gaming Performance
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Alienware introduced the newest Aurora, maintaining its sleek look while adding a range of upgrades.

articles.title: 36 Products That Actually Live Up To The Hype
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Nivea launched a skin firming gel cream. Gold Bond introduced a skin-firming neck and chest cream. Venus Visage launched Teeth Whitening Pens. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Great Jones introduced a ceramic baking dish. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. Billie launched Soothe Comforting Body Wash. Dr. Melaxin launched "Peel Shot". Maybelline launched Lifter Glaze Oil Balm. Capri Blue launched a Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Catalina Crunch launched Cinnamon Toast Protein Cereal. Mrs. Meyer's launched "Acorn Spice" liquid hand soap. Eos launched Cr√®me de Pistachio Better Body Lotion. Sol de Janeiro launched Brazilian Bum Bum Cream. Casper launched Glow-in-the-dark pajamas. Pink Miracle launched shoe cleaner. LeapFrog launched Touch and Learn eReader.

articles.title: Nubia Air launched at IFA 2025, offers 5000mAh battery and Unisoc T8300
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: ZRE Nubia launched the Nubia Air smartphone at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The Nubia Air features a Unisoc T8300 processor, 256GB of storage, a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP triple rear camera setup, and a 5000mAh battery. The price for the 8GB RAM + 256GB storage option is $279.

articles.title: Car service simulation early access free download
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Compare-autoinsurance.Org launched a new blog post detailing the benefits of comparing car insurance quotes online. The blog post emphasizes advantages such as accessibility, multiple choices from various insurers, and the ability to sort quotes easily. This service helps drivers obtain better car insurance deals by providing access to quotes from multiple carriers.

articles.title: Lazada says new tools driving higher sales
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Lazada Philippines launched its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale, offering discounts and free shipping. The e-commerce platform also introduced AI Lazzie, an AI-powered shopping assistant providing personalized guidance and recommendations.

articles.title: Dish TV Shifts the Orbit with VZY Smart TV Launch
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Dish TV is entering the smart TV sector with its VZY series, integrating DTH and OTT content. This launch follows the release of their OTT platform Watcho and the recent launch of Shopzop, as Dish TV diversifies beyond traditional DTH services. The company aims for non-DTH services to contribute 25% to its revenue in the next 18-24 months.

articles.title: GAC Teams Up with SKAI ISYOURGOD for "Tyrannosaurus" Remix of Blueprint Supreme, AION V Breaks the Beat!
articles.summary: GAC collaborated with rapper SKAI ISYOURGOD and Buqicrew to launch a special "Tyrannosaurus" edition of their AION V, a hardcore intelligent-driving SUV. This collaboration aims to attract younger audiences and create a memorable impression of the AION V through a playful and culturally relevant approach.

articles.title: Oppo and Nendo's 'slide-phone' concept unfolds into three screen sizes
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Oppo and Nendo have collaborated on a 'slide-phone' concept. This phone unfolds to offer users three different screen sizes. The concept addresses concerns about the growing size of smartphone screens.

articles.title: G-Dragon meets PUBG: Battlegrounds
articles.author: Lee Yoon-seo
articles.summary: Krafton is collaborating with G-Dragon to introduce new content for PUBG: Battlegrounds across various platforms in September. The collaboration includes special events, experiences, and exclusive battlefield content inspired by G-Dragon, launching with a mobile update on Sept 19. Krafton's previous collaborations with Babymonster and NewJeans have boosted player engagement and sales, contributing to revenue growth.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Neo announced at Lenovo Innovation World at IFA 2025, know details
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola announced the Motorola Edge 60 Neo, Moto G06, and Moto G06 Power smartphones at IFA 2025. The Motorola Edge 60 Neo features a triple rear camera setup with Moto AI, a 6.36-inch 1.5K pOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, up to 12GB RAM, and a 5200mAh battery with 68W charging.

articles.title: Lazada focuses on authenticity and trust in 9.9 Mega Brands Sale
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Lazada is launching its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale from September 8-11, offering discounts, vouchers, and free shipping. They are also introducing AI Lazzie, an AI-powered shopping assistant, to provide personalized recommendations and faster product searches.

articles.title: Former President Biden plans to build his presidential library in Delaware
articles.summary: KENS 5 introduced the KENS 5 app. This app enables users to stream KENS 5 content on their phones. The KENS 5 application is now offered as a new service.

articles.title: I tried replacing my laptop with Samsung DeX and it was a disaster
articles.author: Raghav Sethi
articles.summary: Samsung DeX, a service aiming to transform Samsung phones into desktop computers, faces challenges regarding app compatibility, performance limitations, and form factor issues. While DeX shows potential as a desktop replacement for some, its current state falls short of replacing a traditional laptop due to app scaling problems, performance throttling, and lack of multi-monitor support.

articles.title: A review of a $400 smart toaster is not only an ad. It's also a warning
articles.author: Breaker Moran
articles.summary: A software developer proposed a 'web-enabled breakfast environment' toaster. This concept features an 8-inch OLED display, tailored heating profiles for various foods, connection to an online service for sharing toasting parameters, and an internal camera for sharing images on social media and costs \$600 upfront with a \$20 monthly subscription.

articles.title: 40 Clever Products Worth Showing Off
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: A wide array of new products are introduced, catering to various needs. These include air conduction headphones, hands-free phone mounts, space-saving compression bags, and self-heating foot masks. Also included are a flossing toothbrush, laptop mouse jiggler, portable dual charger, and pill organizer, among other innovative items designed for convenience and problem-solving in everyday life.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'I made more than ¬£70,000 in under 12 hours - and it's all thanks to TikTok'
articles.author: Almha Murphy
articles.summary: Yass Clean, a UK-based cleaning product business, was launched on TikTok Shop in 2022. Utilizing features like Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) for logistics and TikTok LIVE for real-time customer interaction, Yass Clean expanded rapidly, selling over 300,000 boxes of product in eight months and now expanding into the US market.

articles.title: A Look at IBM's Valuation Following Its New Enterprise AI Brand Campaign Launch
articles.author: kshitija@simplywallst.com
articles.summary: IBM launched a new brand campaign focused on enterprise AI adoption, featuring Formula 1 star Lewis Hamilton. This initiative aims to promote IBM's AI, hybrid cloud, and quantum technologies for business transformation. The company also launched the z17 mainframe with enhanced AI acceleration and energy efficiency.

articles.title: ‚ö°Huawei Pura X-Based Affordable Model Launching Soon in China
articles.summary: Huawei is developing a new mid-range foldable smartphone, potentially based on the Huawei Pura X model. Previously, Huawei launched its first tri-fold phone, the Huawei Mate XTs, in China.

articles.title: 43 Magical As Heck Beauty Products
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced a Hair And Body Fragrance Mist with a blend of pistachio, salted caramel, and vanilla scent, along with a Brazilian Bum Bum body cream. Essence offers Lash Princess Mascara with reviewers comparing it to more expensive brands. Vera Wang presents Princess perfume and E.l.f. Cosmetics provides a lip balm with shea butter and hyaluronic acid while Nyx provides waterproof, vegan eyebrow pencil. One/Size introduced a mattifying, waterproof setting spray and Acure has a Brightening Facial Scrub.

articles.title: Shajgoj welcomes remark's home-grown brands to its e-commerce platform
articles.author: Prothom Alo English Desk
articles.summary: Remark USA products, possessing world-class quality, are now available to consumers across Bangladesh via Shajgoj. Officials from Remark USA view this launch as a significant move in bolstering local brands with global standards.

articles.title: N20M and Special Gift Packages up for Grabs in TECNO Blue Santa Xmas
articles.author: Information Nigeria
articles.summary: TECNO is offering N20M and special gift packages in its 'Blue Santa Xmas' promotion.

articles.title: 35 Products For Anyone Who's Ever Uttered The Words 'I'm Too Old For This'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products.  L'Oreal Paris launches Collagen Moisture Filler Moisture Bounce Face Serum.  The Pink Stuff introduces the new "Sqeezy" sponge set designed for tough cleaning projects. Biofreeze releases a new Dry Stick for portable pain relief.  Hatch introduces the Restore 3, a sunrise alarm and sound machine for better sleep routines. Additionally, Olay releases the Super Serum Body Wash.

articles.title: Luxury Flowers NJ Opens First Bricks and Mortar Location in Nutley, Chamber Cuts the Ribbon
articles.author: Deborah Ann Tripoldi
articles.summary: Luxury Flowers NJ, a floral business, opened its first brick and mortar location in Nutley after operating as a mobile flower van. The shop offers flower arrangements with delivery services throughout New Jersey, Connecticut, New York City and Philadelphia. It operates seven days a week.

articles.title: realme launches Note 70 in Nepal with 6300mAh battery and military-grade durability
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: realme has launched the realme Note 70 in Nepal, an entry-level smartphone targeting youth. The phone features a 6300mAh battery with fast and reverse charging, Armorshell Protection with military-grade durability, a 90Hz Eye Comfort Display, and a 13MP AI-powered camera.

articles.title: Unveiling the Shocking "Calamancy" Flavor: My Experience with the Highly Recommended "Pansit Canton" from Donki
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Pansit Canton has launched a new instant noodle flavor called Calamancy. The Calamancy flavor, a citrus fruit common in Southeast Asia, offers a unique taste experience, diverging from conventional noodle seasoning with its tart and sweet notes. It is being sold at Donki stores.

articles.title: 36 TikTok Products Even Haters Of The App Will Love
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new products have recently been introduced. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Tahitian Vanilla Lotion is a new deeply hydrating lotion by Palmer. Gold Bond released a firming neck and chest cream. Lumify Eye Drops are designed for instant reduction in redness in their eyes. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder designed to absorb oil and blur pores. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides.

articles.title: Dreame's innovations earned multiple honors at IFA Innovation Awards 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology introduced several new smart home solutions at IFA 2025. These include the Cyber X stair-climbing robot vacuum, the Aqua Series robot vacuum, the Matrix10 Ultra, the H15 Pro FoamWash, and the Miracle Pro hair care system. Dreame also launched the DZ60 Pro Fully-integrated Dishwasher and the OZ60 Pro Built-in Steam Oven.

articles.title: Here comes the bridal panhandler
articles.summary: Bulk Butter, led by CEO Emily Koltermann, offers a variety of nut butter flavors. Some companies have formalized a process to allocate merchandise in response to bridal requests, hinting at marketing or offering specific product selections.

articles.title: Samsung shoppers get free Galaxy Watch and Buds worth ¬£368 with phone upgrade
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new smartphone in their 'Fan Edition' series, featuring a 6.7" display, advanced cameras, and Galaxy AI functions. The phone is available through Samsung, Amazon and other retailers and comes with a range of promotional offers, aiming to provide an accessible entry point into the Galaxy AI ecosystem.

articles.title: Samsung shoppers get free Galaxy Watch and Buds worth ¬£368 with new S25 FE phone
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new smartphone in its Galaxy S25 lineup. The phone features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED display, advanced camera system, and Galaxy AI functions. Customers who pre-order the phone can receive a free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE.

articles.title: Instacart just raised $200 million to expand its advertising businesshere's a look inside its strategy
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Instacart is expanding its advertising business and has secured $200 million in funding to do so. Instacart differentiates itself by offering advertisers equal access to ad tools based on their sales percentage spent on advertising, with benefits like API access and detailed reporting for top-tier advertisers. Instacart's return on ad spend is high, and cost-per-click prices are lower than Amazon's, which helps it gain advantage over the competitors.

articles.title: Get An iPad Or Pixel? Your Guide To Choosing A Tablet
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: The article compares and contrasts several tablets from Apple, Google, and Samsung. Apple's offerings include the 11th-generation iPad with an A16 chip, the 10th-generation iPad, the 2024 iPad Air with an M2 chip, the 2024 iPad Mini with an A17 Pro chip, and the 2024 iPad Pro with an M4 chip. Other featured products are the Google Pixel Tablet and the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9, S10 FE and S6 Lite, with details on their specifications, features, and target audiences.

articles.title: Oppo A6 GT Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Oppo announced the Oppo A6 GT smartphone in Q3 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a Si/C 7000 mAh battery with 80W wired charging, a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor, and a dual rear camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. It runs on Android 15 with ColorOS 15 and is available with 8GB/12GB RAM and 256GB/512GB storage options.

articles.title: New ¬£69 Android phone could be the smartphone bargain of the year
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G06 and Moto G06 Power smartphones in the UK in October. The Moto G06 is priced at ¬£69.99 and the Moto G06 Power at ¬£89.99, offering features like a 120Hz display, 50MP camera, and large battery at affordable price points.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is here with a cheaper price and ¬£370 giveaway
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 FE, a new budget-friendly addition to the Galaxy S25 series. The phone features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide and 50MP wide cameras, 256GB storage, and Galaxy AI functions, with a starting price of ¬£649. Sky Mobile offers a ¬£23 launch deal with free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE on a 36-month contract.

articles.title: The Gen Z marketplace: how India's youth are rewiring e-commerce
articles.author: Biman Mukherji
org: Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry
articles.summary: Mamaearth is reimagining traditional products like ubtan by offering them in convenient, sustainable formats like tubes. This caters to the preferences of India's Generation Z, who prioritize clean, transparent, and culturally rooted products.

articles.title: 7 Vacuums Under $200 That Perform Just Like A Dyson
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Several companies offer cordless vacuum cleaners as alternatives to the Dyson V8.  SunSare, Chebio, Trucozie, Shark, Levoit, Dsorupa and Lubluelu each provide cordless vacuums with features like long runtimes, multiple attachments, LED lights, and strong suction, with prices ranging from under $100 to around $200. Many reviewers claim these vacuums perform as well or even better than the Dyson, often at a lower cost.

articles.title: Circle to Search Introduces Sweet Translation Update: Enhanced Features and Improved User Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched an update to its Circle to Search feature, enhancing its translation capabilities. The update rolling out to Galaxy devices, includes features like expanded language support, improved accuracy, real-time translation options, limited offline translation, and integration with Samsung Keyboard. This offers benefits such as easier travel, enhanced communication, and access to global information.

articles.title: Switching to Windows' These Are the Best Mac Alternatives
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Alternatives to Apple's desktops and laptops are available, powered by Windows and Linux.

articles.title: 32 Items To Help With Kinda Embarrassing Problems
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: I Dew Care introduced a dry shampoo powder designed to eliminate oily hair while adding volume. The product allows users to extend time between washes, maintaining clean-feeling hair.

articles.title: 29 Cheap Treats From Target
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Tiny Tags introduced a 14-karat gold ion‚Äìplated ladybug necklace. ColourPop launched a limited edition lip mask and scrub duo. Aveeno released a new foot mask, and JLab introduced wireless Bluetooth earbuds. Other newly introduced products include Happy Hair People leave-in conditioner, PopSockets grip, round wicker table lamp, bear plush, Rifle Paper Co. trinket tray, Crock-Pot slow cooker and Byoma phyto-mucin glow serum.

articles.title: Not To Toot My Own Horn, But I've Just Compiled A List Of 27 Of The Best Kitchen Products You've Seen In A While
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Our Place launched the Splendor Blender for single-serve smoothies, featuring a portable design with a screw-on lid. Ninja introduced the Ninja Crispi Air Fryer, an all-in-one system for cooking, eating, and storing leftovers. Ninja also released a Slushi maker to make any drink into a slushee

articles.title: Gadgets Weekly: Motorola Moto Book 60 Pro and more
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Several companies have announced or launched new products and services. Motorola introduced the Moto Book 60 Pro and Razr 60 Swarovski Edition, while Samsung unveiled the Bespoke AI Washer Dryer. Other notable releases include the Acer TravelLite Essential series laptop, Tecno Pova Slim 5G, Luminous Edge Go 1500 Smart Audio Portable Power Station, Lexar JumpDrive M400 USB 3.0 Flash Drive, Sony IER-EX15C Type-C earphones, Lava Bold N1 5G series, Revolut expands partnership with Google Cloud and Wobble Maximus smart TV Series.

articles.title: Viva¬†¬†Empowers Customers, Unveils Winner of Brand Ambassador Challenge
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Limited's brand, Viva, launched a challenge in Nigeria. The challenge is designed to encourage creativity and innovation among Nigerians, aiming to tap into growth opportunities amid unemployment and economic pressures.

articles.title: CDB and RevUP Caribbean launch new phase of incubation programme
articles.author: Jamaica Observer
articles.summary: CDB and RevUP Caribbean have launched a new phase of their incubation programme. This indicates an update to their services.

articles.title: Is Local AI the Unexpected Fix to the Obsolescence of Robot Vacuums?
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Deebot X11 OmniCyclone utilizes AI to autonomously manage house cleaning schedules and methods, functioning even without an internet connection. This features introduction is launching a new product with innovative capabilities.
